text:
Hi Elaine! How are you?
Sorry to reach out just today.. my week has been really crazy. They reached out on Wednesday so I was super happy to hear they made me the job offer. I was super happy and accepted on that very moment. But then I told them about my visa situation which is that I have to renew my visa according to my employer. They consulted it to HR and the lawyers and told me unfortunately they cannot proceed with the offer.. I am quite sad and feeling a bit frustrated because it’s something that exceeds me and cannot do much..

Trying to look the bright side and forward-thinking, I am very grateful that they made me the job offer and now I can know it’s all a matter of visas... I applied to Bournemouth University so I hope if I get in I can after graduating apply with a student visa and get in
It’s sad news but I always try to stay positive and plan next steps. So we’ll see what comes next:pray::skin-tone-4:
